dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 4120 : To amend the National Law Enforcement Museum Act to extend the termination date.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES
form.official-title: To amend the National Law Enforcement Museum Act to extend the termination date.

section.header: National Law Enforcement Museum Act termination date extended
section.text: Section 4(f) of the National Law Enforcement Museum Act (Public Law 106â€“492) is amended by striking 13 years and inserting 16 years.
The provisions of this Act shall take effect as if this Act were enacted on November 8, 2013.

attestation-group.attestation-date: Passed the House of Representatives April 28, 2014.
